CatDescriptText: Leonard Lowman, laborer, North Side, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 11 with question: "Do you think a shorter work week is the answer to the job loss posed by automation?" Answer reads: "It could be a posibility and would spread the work."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Leonard Lowman wearing light colored fedora with dark band and eyeglasses, standing in front of building
